response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations or personal needs. Given its value and quality, it's worth $8,000 to both of us. To make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. This exclusive offer is valid for the next 48 hours. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you wish to proceed with the purchase. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 7200}
